Posts.Content: Hello Katy. Speaking as a man, I would say it's a man thing. We forget pretty much all the important things, our memories are so small we have to save what space there is in there for more trying issues like what time the Simpsons is on t.v Probably doesn't help but hope it put a bit of a smile on you face. You husband will be mortified when you tell him what he missed.   All the best,  big wave, Andy from Dorset
Posts.Title: Am I right to feel disappointed?
